title: Doom 4 playthrough -- Part 1
description: If you've never seen this game in 480p 30fps then you haven't lived.

fragments.text: it's not too bad, volume-wise. DOOM is a pretty loud game.
awww yeaaaa looks almost as good as my phone ep2 runs
love how the stream cant hold a stable 30fps
that was only at the start
dropped all the frames and now its fine
but the overall fps isnt stable
the game looks better than ever
Ah, so this is how Doom 4 would've looked like in 1996
gotta turn off the monitor for that doom 3 feel
looking at it like this it's the same as doom3
wait you can use glory kills for anything other than oob?
i mean i didnt know because i literally went oob with it on my casual run
Somebody actually made a Snapmap that emulated the Doom 3 experience quite well, minus the darkened monitor.
well different profiles have different usecases
it became a shit run imo
you turned off literally everything right?
the glory kill oob is shit
when it came out the speedrun was quite cool but now it's like oob all the time
except portal has no cool launches
time to turn off the glory kill highlights
nah UV is way too easy
i mean UV is nice for ...people i guess but not if you speedrun fps games etc lol
if your brain can only handle aiming OR moving then UV is nice
i mean they couldnt handle aiming without moving
I don't think they could handle brain functionality
When did Turok get this armor, he's usually half naked.
yes doom is an open world rpg
i thought your nick was an emote for some reason nice
I've gotta run, sadly, have a good one @Cubeface21 & chat!
the only thing you need to read is enemy movement LUL
there's a lot of good shit in those logs
don't listen to these illiterate bums
No rush, I'm excited for some DOOM
this is the place where i instantly went oob in my first playthrough, be careful LUL
i glory killed one of the small dudes next to a wall
Holy damn, this chat is literally brimming with mods LichChamp
no glitches happen to me in any game ever FeelsBadMan
only half life but that game is the worst thing mankind has come up with
i think this is the newest game i've seen you play man haha
damn ive got some real wrist pain..
its not from half life. its from csgo KZ awhile back
but when i go hard in HL, or melee. it gets really bad
been dealing with it for a long time
stretching only goes so far for me
nothing better than finding out you have nothing
its been too long for it to be nothing, im hoping for tendinitis because that shit is super fixable
Coob hows it feel to get your ass to mars?
I mean, it looks better than your usual quality!
because its a nightmare to get good fps with them
when the game is not the same tiled texture everywhere your stream becomes so pretty
you should probably shoot the grenade farther away
you still get health if you kill enemies normally
i forgot if that was a difference
Glory kills are for dispatching enemies faster
You don't need to glory kill to get health, but it helps. It drops from enemies normally once you're health is low enough.
and while killing normally does give you health back like Glory killing, it's not exactly as much
maybe a bit less than a Glory kill
You still get health pickups from enemies when on low health, but on Nightmare, health/armor pickups are worth a lot less.
you'll still get health regardless of what you do to kill enemies
I find you have more health dropped the less health you have
Cube just imagine you're giving lil kisses to everyone when you glorykill them
Environmental protection is a must on NM, imo, since you can die real quick.
anything that keeps you from Dime-ing yourself with a rocket is ok in my bood.
I guess the sector switch trick from Doom II doesn't work here if you hit the wrong switch
Hope they have the infinite health door!
yeah it's gonna be f- FeelsBadMan
at work so I got no sound gl w/ rip and tear
btw did anyone see the similarity between dooms opening sequence and zeldas? LUL
mute zeldas sound and play dooms audio - works LUL
You can quickly double tap the melee button on zombies to glory kill them instantly
that shot leading bullshit made me go crazy later in the game on nightmare >_>
took the health even before starting it
Someone should make a bunny hop mod for this game
I'm actually kind of surprised this game runs so well
Oh damn, didn't know you got the upgrade
Ooh nice. I got a GTX 1070 as well, last month.
i can tell tryedz isnt a streamer anymore
because you can see the game
if you dont want to use game capture sure use vulkan
no one programmed it to be able to capture vulkan
because... why waste time on something no game uses
Just ass Programming With Ted to programm it
you can be first to speed run crack life
you can go back all the way if you want

but when he went back to try again he couldnt anymore
is turok 2 done? or its still glitched or some shit
Planning on any other games today Coob?
are you enjoying the new doom so far?
what games are your favourite outside of first person shooters?
ive only ever seen you associated with FPS
his favorite games are dating sims
id really like to see you stream stalker actually
You should play Wasteland some time
Yeah, I enjoyed it a lot. Wasteland 2 that is
Yeah dude, the fucking xray engine
I was about to say "this game doesn't have enough pixels
" but upon further inspection I realize that yes, yes it does, carry on
wasn't it a speedrun thing for some time to lower resolution to the minimum?
wiggity wack here's a doom attack
not really i kinda have disproven that at one point
but you need a shit ton of fps
so here's the real question coob
would you be able to stand watching your own stream right now
it's weird how this game has no kind of hard fps cap at all
i thought it would increase until it burns you gpu out
it doesnt need fps caps for that LUL
okay okay, REAL real question now
doom is more doom than doom!
it's what the 1995 doom 1 wanted to be
it's dark souls clearly cause streamer is dying
well I'm glad you actually set the game to "Doom 4" for some reason
i only remember where the lever is
there is even such game as doom 4
I would agree that this looks tedious to search for secrets in
tru dat, you can't just hump every wall
I've been watching you for like, TEN WHOLE MINUTES
it can't be that boring if you're doing it
btw you can always go back to levels you already completed
it looks pretty even on a shitty pc, really nice
in case you get tired of searching right now
but i dont think you need double jump yet
and hey, you unlock the full map eventually with most secrets
oh I'm sure it won't make it that hard
full disclosure I haven't watched someone play doom4 until now
maybe a little bit of dime
before we know it coob is going to be streaming for honor and overwatch like majority of streamers
watching BT run it at the last gdq was the most I watched in one sitting
i can understand that, considering how boring the run is
jumping is a hard concept to grasp in doom
i'm not destroying quake, the devs might be
looking up and down is a hard concept to grasp in doom.
I loved the exploration in this game, I was so happy with this complete package. I just wish singleplayer dlc came out for it cause I was not interested in multiplayer.
I mean jeez the entire game is downloaded
why do we keep calling it that
it was so limited, even the monster count was extremely low.
you map it and it makes a snap noise?
even if they call it snapping
would having a shitton of monsters make a lotta sense in this game?
it kinda has that later on
snap maps was always limited though
its more like the game randomly exploded no matter what when it released
I never had a problem with the game on launched day. Played through the entire thing without a single crash.
for me it was literally unplayable
every 10-15 minutes it would "crash" as in just lock up and not let me get to the taskmanager either
i know draqu had a lot of crashing too
they're the only reason anyone would ever want to play a game
everything before like, 2004 wasn't real gaming
I used to frequent a site, kongregate.com or somethin'
the new shadow warrior is actually pretty fun
i watched the speedrun of that on the last wgdq; it was the worst fps speedrun i've even watched
when the glitches are inconsistend and takes 15+ attempts; no
I dislike speedruns that are nothing but back to back glitches
only the most hardcore fans of the game can TRULY appreciate such high-level manipulations
probably the end of the level

like "ok we're gonna do this glitch to skip 40 minutes, ok and here this glitch is gonna skip 30 minutes, and here we're gonna skip another hour, ok and we're at the final boss 5 minutes into the run!"
arena locked fps such as serious sam, painkiller, hard reset, shadow warrior 2013, doom 2016 do not fit to speedrunning so much
a HUMP sound would be nice
@CapnClever well, the doom 2016 speedrunner at wgdq attempted to launch himself on a tower over 10 times and failed...

a stands for awful i thought
besides it's only winter for the northern hemisphere
why you hatin' on south-hemi peeps

they're not hard to find if you look
the hard part is bothering to look
he has returned from the dead. also how you liking doom?
